required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Human Blastocyst Secretome and Implantome

lead_sponsor.agency: Instituto Valenciano de Infertilidad, IVI VALENCIA

clinical_study.source: Instituto Valenciano de Infertilidad, IVI VALENCIA

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to identify the protein secretion and consumption profile of the human blastocyst (secretome) and the implanted blastocyst (implantome) using the protein array technology.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Conditioned medium of blastocytes
